basic.blooming: Flowering period July-August, fruiting period September-October
basic.color: Flower color green or white, fruit color black and purple

maintenance.soil: Fine sandy soil with loose texture or soil with specific nutrients
maintenance.sunlight: Like sunshine, place in sunny places
maintenance.watering: Water thoroughly after soil surface dries, avoid saturated water
maintenance.fertilization: Dilute fertilizers following instructions, apply 2-3 times monthly
maintenance.pruning: Remove aged tissues, dead and pest branches timely, and remove overstocked branches
